attributes.action: TV licence payers should have a say about Top Gear Bring back Clarkson
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC should not scrap our favorite TV show Top Gear without any input from the TV Licence payers,  after all we own the BBC - we have paid for it.
We want the BBC to be more accountable to the Licence payers.  Scrap the Director General of the BBC and give each licence payer a vote.  Re-instate Clarkson and Top Gear with immediate affect.  We also demand a refund of our licence fee as we are not getting what we have paid for.
